entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 40%
